sec.p: LHA, VL, and CP planned the project and set the aims. IP and CP provided the genomic data used in the analyses. IP performed molecular analyses. LHA conducted the analyses in ArcGIS, RAMAS/GIS, and VORTEX, analyzed the data, and made the first draft to the manuscript, under the supervision of VL and CP. PS provided expert knowledge on the Little Owl and contributed in improving the data analysis and overall manuscript quality. All authors revised and commented on the manuscript and its contents.
